baseDir.description: Path to directory where to search for the glossary file and markdown files. Default is '.'

outDir.description: Path to directory where to write processed files to. Default: './dist'

glossaryFile.description: Name of the glossary file. Conventional default is 'glossary.md'

baseUrl.description: The base url to use when creating absolute links to glossary.

linking.description: Whether to use relative or absolute links. Default: 'relative'. Choosing 'absolute' requires a 'baseUrl'.
